A0.name: Lens-Makers Glasses
A0.description: Add 10%(+10% per stack, linear) chance to critically strike, dealing double damage.

A1.name: Harvesters' Scythe
A1.description: Adds 5%(+5% per stack, linear) chance to critically strike, and heal 16%(+8% per stack, linear) of your max health on critical strike.

A2.name: Rejuvination Rack
A2.description: Doubles healing(Times two per stack, exponential) from all sources.

A3.name: Teddy Bear
A3.description: Increases dodge chance by 15%(+10% per stack, logarithmic)

A4.name: Aegis
A4.description: Allows overhealing up to two times(Times two per stack, exponential) health

A5.name: Armor Plating
A5.description: Flat Damage Reduction of 2(+1 per stack, linear) damage

A6.name: Infusion
A6.description: Increases health by 1 per kill, up to 10(+10 per stack) health.

A7.name: Soldiers Syringe
A7.description: Increase number of attacks by 1(+1 per stack, linear).

A8.name: Monster Tooth
A8.description: Heal for 1(+1 per stack, linear) health every time you kill an enemy

B0.name: Ace Bandage
B0.description: Adds 5(+2 per stack, linear) base health.

B1.name: Shaped Glass
B1.description: Quadruples current base damage, but resets base health to 1% of its current value.

B2.name: Long Toss
B2.description: Doubles current item counts, but halves current base damage.

B3.name: Titanic Knurl
B3.description: Quadruples current regen, doubles base health.
